description.narrative:
1) Provide 1,000 children access to basic education services. Construction of school with 2 classrooms and one office. 25 ABE teachers will be trained on learners centered and child friendly teaching. ABE teachers will be upgarded to certificate level. 49 CMC members will be trained on centers management. 300 students from poor families will be supported with education materials
2) Improve access and availability of safe drinking water sources among 2100 pastoral and agro-pastoral communities. Selected health institiutions will be supported with medical equipment and materials. 20 health workers will be trained on EPI, community mobilization and BCC/IEC. 3 vaccination campaigns will be supported through perdiem and transport facilitation. 1,000 EPI promotional messages will be produced and distributed to the community.
3) Potable water is made available for 2,100 beneficiaries during the 3 critical months of the year and hardship associated with shortage of water is reduced. 3 shallow wells will be drilled and completed with hand pump. 3 identified water points will be maintained and made ready to serve the community. 6 WATSAN committees will be trained on water point management to ensure water source sustainability. 6 operators will train on operation and maintenance of hand pumps. 2,100 people sensitized on hygiene and sanitation.
To contribute to sustainable basic social service delivery in Cheretti District of Somali Regional State
